# cook your dish here
for _ in range(int(input())):
 n=int(input())
 a=input()
 s=""
 for i in range(1,n,2):
  s=s+a[i]+a[i-1]
 if n%2!=0:
  s=s+a[-1]
 d=""
 for i in s:
  a=219-ord(i)
  d=d+chr(a)
 print(d)

t = int(input())
for q in range(t):
 n = int(input())
 s = input()
 l = list(s)
 for i in range(0, n, 2):
  if i == n-1:
   continue
  t = l[i]
  l[i] = l[i+1]
  l[i+1] = t
 for i in l:
  print(chr(122 - ord(i) + 97), end='')
 print()
